welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ridley, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. We hope you have a wonderful time here!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves a mix of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves a mix of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at North Philadelphia Airport handles all freight and shipping operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport offers all necessary facilities for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and a variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For passengers traveling on private or chartered flights, the private terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport offers a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
